title: 'Cobra Kai' Season 3 With Bill Simmons and Shea Serrano
description:
Bill Simmons and Shea Serrano break down Season 3 of 'Cobra Kai' and make some predictions for what will happen in Season 4.

Hosts: Bill Simmons and Shea Serrano
